name: Bedroom - Sample
description: Sample escape room in the bedroom
hints: Dad has been on me to practice my guitar. Taking my mind off school with guitar is pretty helpful actually [semicolon] maybe I should play it.
Guitar is great to get my mind of things, but sometimes a breath of fresh air would help as well.
Left to right or right to left? This is something I always forget when reading Arabic.

In order to solve this room, you need to figure out your computer password. To find this, you need to solve the puzzle on the guitar and find the hidden letters in the photos. Once you have those hidden letters, match them to the right numbers. Then, reverse the numbers as you are reading from right to left. The correct answer is 223161.
